input.diff_content: Fix bug in HttpClient, refactor StringUtils, add tests, update docs

expected_output.subject: correct timeout handling in HttpClient
expected_output.body:
Fix incorrect timeout calculation that caused premature request
termination. Also includes:
- Refactor StringUtils for better null handling
- Add comprehensive test coverage
- Update README with new usage examples
expected_output.comment: Type 'fix' chosen because it takes priority over refactor/docs/test per multi-type rules
